name: McCollins
tagline: PR and Digital Brand Activation Agency
description: McCollins is a mobile app development agency based in UAE. The company focuses their energies on creating work that gets a second look. It's that second look that takes your brand, your message or your offer from "Whatever" to "Wait a minute". That's why they build stopping power in everything they do, from social media marketing to public relations and from digital brand activation to design.

locations.address: Office 2302, 23rd floor, Al Thuraya II, Dubai Media City
